name: K-array Azimut KAMUT2L II

name: K-array Firenze KH7P I System
headline: Steerable Firenze array platform for arenas and events
description: The Firenze KH7P I platform combines digitally steerable line-array elements with matching low-frequency support for high-output touring and large-format installs.
story: Engineers can build straight hangs or complex grids with KH7P I modules, steering coverage electronically while anchoring the system with Firenze subs for precise, stadium-grade sound.
